actions.text: Read second time and referred to Senate Committee on Finance.
Committee on Finance requested executive comment from OMB; Treasury Department.

official_title: A bill to eliminate the reduction on social security benefits for spouses and surviving spouses receiving certain Government pensions, as recently added to title II of the Social Security Amendments of 1977.
subjects: Old age, survivors and disability insurance
subjects_top_term: Old age, survivors and disability insurance

summary.text: Repeals the requirement under title II (Old Age, Survivors and Disability Insurance) of the Social Security Act that the amount of monthly benefits payable to a spouse or surviving spouse be reduced by the amount such spouse or surviving spouse receives monthly from a Federal or State pension fund.

titles.title: A bill to eliminate the reduction on social security benefits for spouses and surviving spouses receiving certain Government pensions, as recently added to title II of the Social Security Amendments of 1977.
